parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. **The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: DtsJobId
parameters.description: The ID of the data migration or synchronization task.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The timestamp that indicates the end of the time range to query. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: MetricName
parameters.description:
*   **InternetOut**: the outbound traffic over the Internet. Unit: byte.
*   **diskusage_utilization**: the disk usage.
*   **IntranetInRate**: the inbound traffic over the internal network. Unit: byte.
*   **InternetIn**: the inbound traffic from the Internet. Unit: byte.
*   **cpu_total**: the CPU utilization.
*   **memory_usedutilization**: the memory usage.
*   **IntranetOutRate**: the outbound traffic over the internal network. Unit: byte.

parameters.name: MetricType
parameters.description:
Indicates whether the metrics of the cluster or a node are queried. Valid values:

*   **CLUSTER**: The metrics of the cluster are queried.
*   **NODE**: The metrics of a node are queried.

parameters.name: Param
parameters.description: The monitored object. If the **MetricType** parameter is set to **NODE**, set this parameter to the ID of the node that is monitored.

parameters.name: Period
parameters.description: The monitoring interval. Unit: seconds. The minimum value is 15.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The timestamp that indicates the beginning of the time range to query. Unit: milliseconds.
